mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(b.id), b.bucket_name as bucketName, b.start_date as startDate, b.end_date as endDate, b.bucket_state as bucketState FROM bucket b JOIN bucket_tag bt ON b.id = bt.bucket_id JOIN tag t ON bt.tag_id = t.id WHERE (b.bucket_name LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keyword}, "%") OR t.tag_name LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keyword}, "%")) AND user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.id as userId, u.nickname, u.intro, f.friend_status as friendStatus FROM user u JOIN follow f ON u.id = f.follower_id WHERE (u.nickname LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keyword}, "%") OR u.intro LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keyword}, "%")) AND u.id NOT IN (#{userId}) AND f.friend_status = #{friendStatus}

SELECT u.id as userId, u.nickname, u.intro FROM user u WHERE (u.nickname LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keyword}, "%") OR u.intro LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keyword}, "%")) AND u.id NOT IN (#{userId}) AND u.id NOT IN ( select u.id from user u JOIN follow f ON u.id = f.follower_id )

SELECT DISTINCT (b.id) as bucketId, u.id as userId, b.bucket_name as bucketName, b.bucket_state as bucketState, b.end_date as endDate, u.profile_url as userProfileUrl FROM bucket b JOIN bucket_tag bt ON b.id = bt.bucket_id JOIN tag t ON bt.tag_id = t.id JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id JOIN bookmark bm ON bm.bucket_id = b.id JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.id WHERE (b.bucket_name LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keyword}, "%") OR c.category_name LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keyword}, "%")) AND u.id NOT IN (#{userId}) AND friend_status = #{friendStatus}
